folder: Bergen Street & Rochester Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Bergen Street, south side, between Rochester and Buffalo Aves. A view of Hunterfly Road. An old road to Flatbush now in disuse. In the background, is a view of St. Mary's Hospital.

1925.

Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.

folder: Bergen Street & Rochester Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
1. Bergen Street, east from Rochester Avenue, showing demolition for the Kingsborough Houses. In the background is St. Josephs 2. Institute, at Buffalo Avenue, seen also in view 2.

folder: Bergen Street & Rochester Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Bergen Street, east from Rochester Avenue. The area behind the fence is being developed into the Kingsborough Houses, a New York City Housing Authority project. In the background, at Buffalo Avenue, is St. Josephs Institute.

October 24, 1940
Views 1,2

P.L. Sperr

View 2 shows the same area, looking west from Ralph Avenue

folder: Bergen Street & Rochester Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Bergen Street, south side, between Rochester and Buffalo Avenues, showing an old alley and old homes, running south between Nos. 1710 and 1698.

P. L. Sperr

July 13, 1940

folder: Rochester Avenue & Bergen Street, Brooklyn, NY
text:
Rochester Avenue, north from Bergen Street, showing, on the east side of the avenue, the construction of Kingsborough Houses, a low-rent housing project of the New York City Housing Authority. Several hundred old-type frame and brick dwellings
were razed.

P. L. Sperr
  October 24, 1940
Views 1,2

3. Rochester Ave. at Bergen S. and northward. Neg. A-230
P.L. Sperr, photographer  August 2, 1941
